title: 25th July 1965: American singer-songwriter Bob Dylan goes electric at the Newport Folk Festival
itunes:summary: Having come to prominence in the early 1960s with songs that chronicled the social situation in the USA, Dylan’s dramatic shift away from his traditional instruments of acoustic guitar and harmonica was said to have, ‘electrified one half of his audience, and electrocuted the ...
